mapper.select: /*合同非废弃、单据类别为融资租赁合同*/ select COUNT(1) from FM_ConAcc a where isnull(a.FIsDrop,0)!=1 and a.FDocCate = '101'

select sum((cast(a.Fnum as int) * a.FMYHKE + a.FFee)) + 1767172084 'sum' from FinLease_Contract a join FM_ConAcc b on a.FContractID = b.ID where isnull(b.FIsDrop,0)!= 1 and isnull(a.WFState,0) != 3 and YEAR(b.FContractTime) >= 2017;

select COUNT(1) 'Sales' from FinLease_Contract a join FM_ConAcc b on a.FContractID = b.ID /*换车换方案--判断非废弃合同*/ left join ( select a.id ,case when CONVERT(varchar(7),a.FContractTime,120) = CONVERT(varchar(7),c.FContractTime,120) then '当月换车' else '跨月换车' end '换车类型' from FinLease_Contract a left join FM_ConAcc b on a.FContractID = b.ID left join FinLease_Contract c on a.FContract_Old = c.ID where isnull(a.Fhc,0) = 1 and isnull(a.WFState,0) != 3 and isnull(b.FIsDrop,0) != 1 and a.FContract_Old is not null ) hc on a.ID = hc.ID /*换车换方案--判断废弃合同*/ left join ( select a.id ,a.FContract_Old 'old_ID' ,case when CONVERT(varchar(7),a.FContractTime,120) = CONVERT(varchar(7),c.FContractTime,120) then '当月换车' else '跨月换车' end '换车类型' from FinLease_Contract a left join FM_ConAcc b on a.FContractID = b.ID left join FinLease_Contract c on a.FContract_Old = c.ID where isnull(a.Fhc,0) = 1 and isnull(a.WFState,0) != 3 and isnull(b.FIsDrop,0) != 1 and a.FContract_Old is not null ) hf on a.ID = hf.old_ID where ( /*废弃，终止的合同，是跨月换车的原合同*/ (b.FIsDrop = 1 and a.WFState = 1 and hf.old_ID is not null and hf.换车类型 = '跨月换车') or /*非废弃，非终止，非换车的合同*/ (isnull(b.FIsDrop,0) != 1 and isnull(a.WFState,0) != 3 and isnull(a.Fhc,0) != 1) or /*非废弃，非终止，当月换车的新合同*/ (isnull(b.FIsDrop,0) != 1 and isnull(a.WFState,0) != 3 and a.Fhc = 1 and hc.ID is not null and hc.换车类型 = '当月换车') or /*SX_2017010002换车换方案未能有效管理旧合同*/ a.ID = '4290' ) /*剔除不算业绩的换车换方案*/ and a.ID not in ('6169','8194','10591') and YEAR(a.FContractTime) > 2017

/*排除营销部*/ select * from ( select case when year(a.FBirthday) > 1994 then '95后' when year(a.FBirthday) > 1989 then '90后' when year(a.FBirthday) > 1984 then '85后' when year(a.FBirthday) > 1979 then '80后' else '80前' end 'age' ,count(1) 'co' from T_BD_Person a --人员表 left join T_ORG_PositionMember c on c.FPersonID = a.fid --人员岗位对应表 left join T_ORG_Position d on c.FPositionID = d.FID --岗位表 left join T_HR_JobLevel h on d.FJobLevelID = h.fID --职层表 left join T_HR_PERSONPOSITION j on j.fpersonid = a.fid --入离职日期表 left join T_ORG_Admin k on k.fid = d.FAdminOrgUnitID --架构表 /*在职*/ where j.fleftdate is null /*融资租赁事业部--营销部*/ and k.FDisplayName_L2 not like '%喜相逢_股东大会_总裁_常务副总裁_融资性租赁事业部%' and a.FBirthday is not null group by case when year(a.FBirthday) > 1994 then '95后' when year(a.FBirthday) > 1989 then '90后' when year(a.FBirthday) > 1984 then '85后' when year(a.FBirthday) > 1979 then '80后' else '80前' end ) a order by case a.age when '95后' then 5 when '90后' then 4 when '85后' then 3 when '80后' then 2 when '80前' then 1 end
